        @POST
 @Path(value="/find")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findUser(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post Request to get a json all users
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID"
}
        Returns:
        {
  "userList":[
    {
      "id":userID,
      "username":"username",
      "email":"email",
      "lastName":"last name",
      "firstName":"first name",
      "otherProperties":{
        "propertie1":"value",
        "propertie2":"value",
      }
    },
  ],
  "successful":true
}

      • getFriends

        @POST
 @Path(value="/friends")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFriends(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post Request to get all friends of a user
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID",
  "id":userID //optional
}
        Returns:
        {
  "friendList":[
    {
      "id":"id",
      "username":"username",
      "lastName":"last name",
      "firstName":"first name",
      "email":"email",
      "trueFriend":true/false,
      "date":timestamp of adding      
    },
  ],
  "successful":true
}
